text: Arnaud Jean-Georges Beltrame (18 April 1973 – 24 March 2018) was a French lieutenant colonel in the National Gendarmerie and Deputy Commander of the Departmental Gendarmerie's Aude Groupment.officier adjoint au commandement du groupement de gendarmerie de l’Aude Beltrame was killed by a terrorist at Trèbes after having exchanged himself for a hostage. After a three-hour stand- off, the terrorist stabbed him the throat and shot Beltrame. French President Emmanuel Macron said that Beltrame deserved "the respect and admiration of the whole nation.". ==References== Category:1973 births Category:2018 deaths Category:French murder victims Category:French military people
title: Arnaud Beltrame
